name: Magic Kitchen (TheAishi)
description:
Magic Kitchen has arrived!

This dog has unleashed a tremendous amount of magic because of how hungry it is!

Now you must help this little witch to feed him so that he does not destroy everything around him with his magic spells. And wow, that dog is capricious..

- More than 30 levels to enjoy!

- Different skins to try!

- And a lot of spells and combinations to dodge!

Controls:

- Arrows (move)

- Z (interact)

(If you find any bug please do not hesitate to write it so we can review and correct it)
